extendedInfo.description: Harvest to Hand is a free app that can help you find locally harvested food, seasonal agritourism venues, food festivals, farmers markets and much more where ever you may be located in the United States.View by list or on the map to see whatâs going on where you are, mark your favorites and share your Harvest to Hand experience with others through Facebook and Twitter.*** HELP IMPROVE OUR LISTINGS! ***Do you represent a local food or farm venue? Is your favorite farmers market missing hours of operations? Want to market your local event or share a favorite in your area? We want to hear about it! Help foodies connect to local agriculture around you by visiting www.harvesttohand.com and completing our form. Remember to buy local!

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: A great way to support your local farmers and economy.  Wish it had more events.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for local grown foods
reviews.comment: Thanks for a great app, very useful for finding local grown foods and items!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Farmers markets are conveniently located on a map but info doesn\'t provide days of the week or times. Info takes a long time to load
reviews.author: Taylor Hunter
